name: SCNetworkConnectionFlags
desc: Flags that indicate whether the specified network node name or address is reachable, whether a connection is required, and whether some user intervention may be required when establishing a connection.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsTransientConnection: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address can be reached via a transient connection, such as PPP.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsReachable: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address can be reached using the current network configuration.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsConnectionRequired: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address can be reached using the current network configuration, but a connection must first be established.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsConnectionAutomatic: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address can be reached using the current network configuration, but a connection must first be established.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsInterventionRequired: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address can be reached using the current network configuration, but a connection must first be established.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsIsLocalAddress: Int
items.desc: The specified node name or address is one associated with a network interface on the current system.

items.name: var kSCNetworkFlagsIsDirect: Int
items.desc: Network traffic to the specified node name or address does not go through a gateway, but is routed directly to one of the interfaces in the system.
